extDesc.message: Open random bookmarks from a chosen folder

pinHelp.message: Use the <pin> next to your preferred folders to make them appear here the next time you open this menu.
pinHelp.description: <pin> is replaced with a pin image

pin.description: Alt-text for users who can't see the pin image

searchInFolderAndSubfolders.message: Pick from the selected folder & its subfolders

searchInFolderOnly.message: Pick from the selected folder only
